short_summary: Demolition of four buildings at Cove Island, Tobermory, ON, including asbestos removal
description: This procurement involves the demolition of four buildings on Cove Island, north of Tobermory, ON, including the removal of asbestos-containing materials.
full_summary:
Asbestos Building Demolition Tender Announcement
=====================================

**Reference Number**: PW-22-01010783
**Solicitation Number**: 30002781
**Tender Closing Date**: 08 November 2022, 13:00:00

**Overview**

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO-Canada) seeks a contractor to demolish four vacant buildings on Cove Island, north of Tobermory, Ontario. The project will involve the removal of structures containing asbestos and lead paint.

**Scope of Work**

The scope of work includes the following:

* Demolish four vacant buildings on Cove Island, including a radio building, a generator building, an old garage/shed, and an abandoned garage.
* Remove all building contents and materials, and dispose of them at a licensed waste facility.
* Abate asbestos-containing materials according to proper procedures.
* Remove wooden structures for disposal off-site.
* Demolish buildings in their entirety to the foundation slab.

**Contract Details**

* **Contract Start Date**: May 2, 2023
* **Contract End Date**: May 31, 2023
* **Trade Agreements**: The requirement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Security Requirements**

No security requirements are applicable to this project.

**Contact Information**

For inquiries, please contact Fortuna Sophia Dorgbetor at **450-521-9004** or **DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca**. Attachments: The solicitation documents are available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/21/9abc462564b603fc108b3cd87ffb9a8a/](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/21/9abc462564b603fc108b3cd87ffb9a8a/). The requested qualification to supply certification documents should be submitted in one of Canada's official languages.

**Important Notes**

* Canada Buy and Sell.gc.ca is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on this procurement.

**French Translation Available**

The translation of the notice is included in this document. This project is a call to qualify. Request for qualification includes attachments. Submission of qualification must be accompanied by a capability document and a certificate of bonding.

Considering the small space,
